functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Seattle that you can visit from March 29th to March 31st, 2022:

1. **Seattle Aquarium**
   - Address: 1483 Alaskan Way Pier 59, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
   - Phone: (206) 386-4300
   - Website: [seattleaquarium.org](https://www.seattleaquarium.org/)

2. **The Seattle Great Wheel**
   - Address: 1301 Alaskan Wy, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
   - Phone: (206) 623-8607
   - Website: [seattlegreatwheel.com](http://seattlegreatwheel.com/)

3. **Chihuly Garden and Glass**
   - Address: 305 Harrison St, Seattle, WA 98109, USA
   - Phone: (206) 753-4940
   - Website: [chihulygardenandglass.com](https://www.chihulygardenandglass.com/)

4. **Olympic Sculpture Park**
   - Address: 2901 Western Ave, Seattle, WA 98121, USA
   - Phone: (206) 654-3100
   - Website: [seattleartmuseum.org](https://www.seattleartmuseum.org/visit/olympic-sculpture-park/)

5. **The Gum Wall**
   - Address: 1428 Post Alley, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
   - Phone: (206) 587-2414
   - Website: [unexpectedproductions.org](https://unexpectedproductions.org/gumwall/)

6. **Seattle Center**
   - Address: 305 Harrison St, Seattle, WA 98109, USA
   - Phone: (206) 684-7200
   - Website: [seattlecenter.com](https://www.seattlecenter.com/)

7. **Museum of Pop Culture**
   - Address: 325 5th Ave N, Seattle, WA 98109, USA
   - Phone: (206) 770-2700
   - Website: [mopop.org](https://www.mopop.org/)

8. **Beneath the Streets**
   - Address: 102 Cherry St, Seattle, WA 98104, USA
   - Phone: (206) 624-1237
   - Website: [beneath-the-streets.com](http://www.beneath-the-streets.com/)

9. **Seattle Art Museum**
   - Address: 1300 1st Ave, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
   - Phone: (206) 654-3100
   - Website: [seattleartmuseum.org](https://www.seattleartmuseum.org/)

10. **Kerry Park**
    - Address: 211 W Highland Dr, Seattle, WA 98119, USA
    - Phone: (206) 684-4075
    - Website: [seattle.gov](http://www.seattle.gov/parks/find/parks/kerry-park)

11. **Space Needle**
    - Address: 400 Broad St, Seattle, WA 98109, USA
    - Phone: (206) 905-2100
    - Website: [spaceneedle.com](https://www.spaceneedle.com/)

12. **Smith Tower**
    - Address: 506 2nd Ave, Seattle, WA 98104, USA
    - Phone: (206) 624-0414
    - Website: [smithtower.com](http://www.smithtower.com/)

13. **Pike Place Market**
    - Address: 85 Pike St, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
    - Phone: (206) 682-7453
    - Website: [pikeplacemarket.org](https://www.pikeplacemarket.org/)

14. **Pier 55**
    - Address: 1101 Alaskan Wy, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
    - Phone: (206) 623-1445
    - Website: [argosycruises.com](https://www.argosycruises.com/parking-directions/)

15. **Original Selfie Museum | Seattle**
    - Address: 92 Union St, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
    - Phone: (206) 487-4500
    - Website: [originalselfiemuseum.com](https://originalselfiemuseum.com/)

16. **Washington Park Arboretum**
    - Address: 2300 Arboretum Dr E, Seattle, WA 98112, USA
    - Phone: (206) 543-8800
    - Website: [botanicgardens.uw.edu](https://botanicgardens.uw.edu/washington-park-arboretum/)

17. **Sky View Observatory - Columbia Center**
    - Address: 700 4th Ave, Seattle, WA 98104, USA
    - Phone: (206) 386-5564
    - Website: [skyviewobservatory.com](http://skyviewobservatory.com/)

18. **Discovery Park**
    - Address: Seattle, WA 98199, USA
    - Phone: (206) 386-4236
    - Website: [seattle.gov](https://www.seattle.gov/parks/allparks/discovery-park)

19. **The Museum of Flight**
    - Address: Seattle, WA 98108, USA
    - Phone: (206) 764-5700
    - Website: [museumofflight.org](https://www.museumofflight.org/)

20. **International Fountain**
    - Address: 305 Harrison St, Seattle, WA 98109, USA
    - Phone: (206) 684-7200
    - Website: [seattlecenter.com](https://www.seattlecenter.com/explore/attractions/international-fountain)

Enjoy your visit to Seattle!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

chat_history.name: restaurant_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular restaurants in Seattle that you can consider for breakfast, lunch, and dinner from March 29th to March 31st, 2022:

### Breakfast
1. **Ting's Red Lantern**
   - Cuisines: Italian, Bakery, BBQ, Fast Food, Chinese, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $24
   - Rating: 4.2

2. **Ceviche Tapas Bar & Restaurant**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Chinese, Desserts
   - Average Cost: $86
   - Rating: 4.4

3. **Mother Ringlet**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Cafe, Mediterranean, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $63
   - Rating: 2.5

### Lunch
1. **Café Burger BC**
   - Cuisines: Tea, French, Bakery, BBQ, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $43
   - Rating: 3.7

2. **The Godinho's**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Pizza, American, BBQ, Cafe, Indian
   - Average Cost: $96
   - Rating: 3.8

3. **Goli Vada Pav No. 1**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Bakery, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $31
   - Rating: 3.4

### Dinner
1. **Delhi Darbar Dhaba**
   - Cuisines: Cafe, Pizza, Mediterranean
   - Average Cost: $69
   - Rating: 3.2

2. **Depaul's**
   - Cuisines: BBQ, Desserts, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $83
   - Rating: 3.7

3. **Munch Nation**
   - Cuisines: Desserts, BBQ, Cafe, Mediterranean, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $55
   - Rating: 3.8

Feel free to choose any of these restaurants based on your preferences for breakfast, lunch, and dinner during your stay in Seattle. Enjoy your meals!
